41 namespace reactphysics3d {
42 
43 // Class Logger
48 class Logger {
49 
50  public:
51 
53  enum class Level {Error = 1, Warning = 2, Information = 4};
54 
56  enum class Category {World, Body, Joint, ProxyShape};
57 
59  enum class Format {Text, HTML};
60 
62  static std::string getCategoryName(Category category) {
63 
64  switch(category) {
65  case Category::World: return "World";
66  case Category::Body: return "Body";
67  case Category::Joint: return "Joint";
68  case Category::ProxyShape: return "ProxyShape";
69  }
70 
71  assert(false);
72  return "";
73  }
74 
76  static std::string getLevelName(Level level) {
77 
78  switch(level) {
79  case Level::Information: return "Information";
80  case Level::Warning: return "Warning";
81  case Level::Error: return "Error";
82  }
83 
84  assert(false);
85  return "";
86  }
87 
89  class Formatter {
90 
91  public:
92 
94  Formatter() {
95 
96  }
97 
99  virtual ~Formatter() {
100 
101  }
102 
104  virtual std::string getHeader() const {
105  return "";
106  }
107 
109  virtual std::string getTail() const {
110  return "";
111  }
112 
114  virtual std::string format(const time_t& time, const std::string& message, Level level, Category category) = 0;
115  };
116 
117  class TextFormatter : public Formatter {
118 
119  public:
120 
122  TextFormatter() {
123 
124  }
125 
127  virtual ~TextFormatter() {
128 
129  }
130 
132  virtual std::string getHeader() const override {
133 
134  // Get current date
135  auto now = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
136  auto time = std::chrono::system_clock::to_time_t(now);
137 
138  std::stringstream ss;
139  ss << "ReactPhysics3D Logs" << std::endl;
140  ss << "ReactPhysics3D Version: " << RP3D_VERSION << std::endl;
141  ss << "Date: " << std::put_time(std::localtime(&time), "%Y-%m-%d") << std::endl;
142  ss << "---------------------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
143 
144  return ss.str();
145  }
146 
148  virtual std::string format(const time_t& time, const std::string& message,
149  Level level, Category category) override {
150  std::stringstream ss;
151 
152  // Time
153  ss << std::put_time(std::localtime(&time), "%X") << " ";
154 
155  // Level
156  ss << getLevelName(level) << " ";
157 
158  // Category
159  ss << getCategoryName(category) << " ";
160 
161  // Message
162  ss << message << std::endl;
163 
164  return ss.str();
165  }
166  };
167 
168  class HtmlFormatter : public Formatter {
169 
170  private:
171 
173  virtual std::string getHeader() const override {
174 
175  // Get current date
176  auto now = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
177  auto time = std::chrono::system_clock::to_time_t(now);
178 
179  std::stringstream ss;
180  ss << "<!DOCTYPE HTML>" << std::endl;
181  ss << "<html>" << std::endl;
182  ss << "<head>" << std::endl;
183  ss << "<title>ReactPhysics3D Logs</title>" << std::endl;
184  ss << "<style>" << generateCSS() << "</style>" << std::endl;
185  ss << "</head>" << std::endl;
186  ss << "<body>" << std::endl;
187  ss << "<h1>ReactPhysics3D Logs</h1>" << std::endl;
188  ss << "<div class='general_info'>" << std::endl;
189  ss << "<p>ReactPhysics3D version: " << RP3D_VERSION << "</p>" << std::endl;
190  ss << "<p>Date: " << std::put_time(std::localtime(&time), "%Y-%m-%d") << "</p>" << std::endl;
191  ss << "</div>" << std::endl;
192  ss << "<hr>";
193 
194  return ss.str();
195  }
196 
198  virtual std::string getTail() const override {
199 
200  std::stringstream ss;
201 
202  ss << "</body>" << std::endl;
203  ss << "</html>" << std::endl;
204 
205  return ss.str();
206  }
207 
208  std::string generateCSS() const {
209  return "body {"
210  " background-color: #e6e6e6;"
211  " font-family: SFMono-Regular,Menlo,Monaco,Consolas,'Liberation Mono','Courier New',monospace; "
212  "} "
213  "body > div { clear:both; } "
214  "body > div > div { float: left; } "
215  "h1 {"
216  " margin: 5px 5px 5px 5px;"
217  "} "
218  ".general_info > p {"
219  "margin: 5px;"
220  "font-weight: bold;"
221  "} "
222  ".line { "
223  "font-size: 13px; "
224  "color: #212529; "
225  "margin: 0px 5px 2px 5px; "
226  "} "
227  ".time { "
228  "margin-right: 20px; "
229  "width:80px; "
230  "} "
231  ".level { "
232  "margin-right: 20px; "
233  "width: 90px; "
234  "}"
235  ".category { "
236  "margin-right: 20px; "
237  "width: 100px; "
238  "font-weight: bold; "
239  "}"
240  ".message { "
241  "color: #2e2e2e; "
242  "word-wrap: break-word; "
243  "max-width: 800px; "
244  "} "
245  ".body > .category, .body > .message { "
246  "color: #00994d;"
247  "} "
248  ".world > .category, .world > .message { "
249  "color: #3477DB; "
250  "} "
251  ".joint .category, .joint > .message { "
252  "color: #bf8040; "
253  "} "
254  ".proxyshape .category, .proxyshape > .message { "
255  "color: #9933ff; "
256  "} "
257  ".warning { "
258  "color: #ff9900 !important; "
259  "} "
260  ".error { "
261  "color: red !important; "
262  "} ";
263  }
264 
266  std::string toLowerCase(const std::string& text) {
267  std::string textLower = text;
268  std::transform(textLower.begin(), textLower.end(), textLower.begin(), ::tolower);
269  return textLower;
270  }
271 
272  public:
273 
275  HtmlFormatter() {
276 
277  }
278 
280  virtual ~HtmlFormatter() {
281 
282  }
283 
285  virtual std::string format(const time_t& time, const std::string& message,
286  Level level, Category category) override {
287 
288  std::stringstream ss;
289 
290  ss << "<div class='line " + toLowerCase(getCategoryName(category)) + " " + toLowerCase(getLevelName(level)) + "'>";
291 
292  // Time
293  ss << "<div class='time'>";
294  ss << std::put_time(std::localtime(&time), "%X");
295  ss << "</div>";
296 
297  // Level
298  ss << "<div class='level'>";
299  ss << getLevelName(level);
300  ss << "</div>";
301 
302  // Category
303  ss << "<div class='category'>";
304  ss << getCategoryName(category);
305  ss << "</div>";
306 
307  // Message
308  ss << "<div class='message " << toLowerCase(getCategoryName(category)) <<
309  " " + toLowerCase(getLevelName(level)) << "'>" << std::endl;
310  ss << message;
311  ss << "</div>";
312 
313  ss << "</div>";
314 
315  return ss.str();
316  }
317  };
318 
319 
321  class Destination {
322 
323  public:
324 
326  uint levelFlag;
327 
329  Formatter* formatter;
330 
332  Destination(uint levelFlag, Formatter* logFormatter)
333  : levelFlag(levelFlag), formatter(logFormatter) {
334 
335  }
336 
338  virtual ~Destination() {
339 
340  }
341 
343  virtual void write(const time_t& time, const std::string& message, Level level, Category category) = 0;
344  };
345 
346  class FileDestination : public Destination {
347 
348  private:
349 
350  std::string mFilePath;
351 
353  std::ofstream mFileStream;
354 
355  public:
356 
358  FileDestination(const std::string& filePath, uint levelFlag, Formatter* formatter)
359  :Destination(levelFlag, formatter), mFilePath(filePath),
360  mFileStream(filePath, std::ios::binary) {
361 
362  if(!mFileStream.is_open()) {
363  throw(std::runtime_error("ReactPhysics3D Logger: Unable to open an output stream to file " + mFilePath));
364  }
365 
366  // Writer the head
367  mFileStream << formatter->getHeader() << std::endl;
368  }
369 
371  virtual ~FileDestination() override {
372 
373  // Writer the tail
374  mFileStream << formatter->getTail() << std::endl;
375 
376  if (mFileStream.is_open()) {
377 
378  // Close the stream
379  mFileStream.close();
380  }
381  }
382 
384  virtual void write(const time_t& time, const std::string& message, Level level, Category category) override {
385  mFileStream << formatter->format(time, message, level, category) << std::endl << std::flush;
386  }
387  };
388 
390  class StreamDestination : public Destination {
391 
392  private:
393 
395  std::ostream& mOutputStream;
396 
397  public:
398 
400  StreamDestination(std::ostream& outputStream, uint levelFlag, Formatter* formatter)
401  :Destination(levelFlag, formatter), mOutputStream(outputStream) {
402 
403  // Writer the head
404  mOutputStream << formatter->getHeader() << std::endl;
405  }
406 
408  virtual ~StreamDestination() override {
409 
410  // Writer the tail
411  mOutputStream << formatter->getTail() << std::endl;
412  }
413 
415  virtual void write(const time_t& time, const std::string& message, Level level, Category category) override {
416  mOutputStream << formatter->format(time, message, level, category) << std::endl << std::flush;
417  }
418  };
419 
420 
421  private:
422 
423  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
424 
426  List<Destination*> mDestinations;
427 
429  Map<Format, Formatter*> mFormatters;
430 
432  std::mutex mMutex;
433 
434  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
435 
437  Formatter* getFormatter(Format format) const;
438 
439  public :
440 
441  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
442 
444  Logger();
445 
447  ~Logger();
448 
450  void addFileDestination(const std::string& filePath, uint logLevelFlag, Format format);
451 
453  void addStreamDestination(std::ostream& outputStream, uint logLevelFlag, Format format);
454 
456  void removeAllDestinations();
457 
459  void log(Level level, Category category, const std::string& message);
460 };

463 
464 #ifdef IS_LOGGING_ACTIVE
465 
466 // Use this macro to log something
467 #define RP3D_LOG(logger, level, category, message) logger->log(level, category, message)
468 
469 #else // If logger is not active
470 
471 // Empty macro in case logs are not enabled
472 #define RP3D_LOG(logger, level, category, message)
473 
474 #endif
475 
476 // Hash function for struct VerticesPair
477 namespace std {
478 
479  template<> struct hash<reactphysics3d::Logger::Format> {
480 
481  size_t operator()(const reactphysics3d::Logger::Format format) const {
482 
483  return static_cast<size_t>(format);
484  }
485  };
486 }
487 
488 #endif
